name: Caldwell - Blind Mans Bluff - Maduro - This is Trouble Robusto
additionalNotes: The Blind Man’s Bluff Maduro uses a Pennsylvania maduro wrapper over a Sumatran binder and fillers from the Dominican Republic. The cigars are produced at Tabacalera William Ventura, the first time a Blind Man’s Bluff line has been made outside of Honduras. The cigar delivers a rich bold flavor profile, medium-full to full body with notes of chocolate, dried fruit, leather, coffee, and hints of pepper.
